credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Earle F. Hiscock
title: Hem measure
description: Flat ruler surmounted by head of woman in 3/4 frontal view, her loose, flowing tresses entwined with large flowers; face of ruler marked with lines and dots at 1/8-inch intervals and the numbers 1, 2 and 3 at each full inch; square slide with central flower framed by scrolls on each side.
name: Hem measure
